review: Its convenient when you want to use popular apps like Netflix... and that is it. I wish spotify or other VERY common and popular apps would be transferable. I was highly disappointed and would return it if I did not buy it as a gift for my girlfriend.

review: It's the easiest way to stream stuff from the most popular services to your TV, and it's cheap. There are now solutions for streaming local media, at least from android devices. If the tab casting or desktop casting ever gets smoother, this thing will be indispensable.
